featured.text: Two weeks later, black stripes appear on her body, indicating the gender change is complete.

other.text: In 1955, Anderson became the first black soloist to sing with the Metropolitan Opera of New York City.

Oolong tea is prepared similarly to black tea, but without the fermentation time.

definition.zh_def: 黑色的，缺乏光亮或顏色的。
definition.en_def: The darkest color, the result of the absence or complete absorption of light.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful black dress to the party.
